projects.name: Ezra Alexander's Portfolio
projects.desc: Using React and SCSS, I developed a portfolio for a very close peer of mine. It essential serves as Ezra Alexander's personal, digital art gallery.

projects.name: The Unique Bean
projects.desc: Developed a rudimentary UI for a fictional coffee shop. Utilized React to create an efficient and responsive UI, used Redux for stable state management - particularly as a form of local storage. Implemented features like product filter and, “add-to-cart” functionality.

projects.name: The Balloon Gallery
projects.desc: Using React and CSS, I built the frontend for a fictional party coordinating service. Leveraging React’s features, I created a seamless user experience, with form and routing functionality. Crafted a visually appealing user interface that adapts across devices and browsers.

projects.name: Headphones & Earbuds
projects.desc: Built a sleek UI for a headphone and earbuds store using HTML5, SCSS, and Vanilla JavaScript. Added cart functionality, alternate light/dark modes, added in HTML elements via vanilla JavaScript.
